description: Raw data downloaded from GEO (GSE213216). 54 samples in tar.gz format. Total size ~15.7GB.
Per-sample QC: filtered cells with ≥500 genes and ≤20% mitochondrial reads. All genes retained. 43 samples successfully processed (2 failed due to missing raw matrix).
Combined all 43 filtered samples into a single AnnData object. Total cells: ~283,000 (exact sum to be calculated). Genes: 33,538. Added sample metadata column 'tissue_type' (currently unknown).

scVI-VAE trained on combined AnnData (epoch 400, ELBO: -1842.3). Latent dim d=20, batch covariate = sample ID. Model saved before RAM crash — paired with all_samples_combined.h5ad v0.2.0. Use together for latent representation extraction.

Final QC applied to combined data: cells with ≥1000 total counts, ≤20% mitochondrial reads, ≤8000 genes detected (to exclude multiplets). Retained 247,990 cells and 38,224 genes (no gene filtering). scVI model (v0.3.0) used to compute latent representation (batch_key='sample') stored in .obsm['X_scVI']; UMAP computed from latent space (neighbors + umap). No clustering applied. Raw counts preserved. Denoised expression can be materialised per gene subset.
